dt-option.name: language.searchPanes

type.description: This option is capable of holding all of the sub-options for languages for the panes.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init language.searchPanes` object is `-type undefined`. Meaning that as standard there are no extra options to add to the panes for language.
dt-option.description:
As standard, no custom options will be applied to the pane specific language options if `-init language.searchPanes` is undefined. Otherwise the related options will be applied if they are defined within this object. The language options from the parent table propagate down to the SearchPanes DataTable, so any language options set there will also affect the panes. The table specific language options for SearchPanes can be set using `-init searchPanes.dtOpts` and setting the `-init language` option within it.
This is a set of default values that can be set, they are overridden by `-init searchPanes.i18n` for case specific options.
This is useful as it means that the language options can be set for panes leading to increased internationalisation.
